sentences.sContent: The animal seizes its prey by the throat and suffocates it to death.
sentences.sCn: 这种动物会抓住猎物的喉咙，使其窒息而死。

sentences.sContent: One of the puppies suffocated inside the plastic bag.
sentences.sCn: 其中一只小狗在塑料袋里闷死了。

words.tran: 令人窒息的，喘不过气的

trans.tranOther: to die or make someone die by preventing them from breathing
